workout_file.author: COACH
workout_file.name: W1-Thursday-Sweet Spot-60mins
workout_file.description: Total duration: 60 minutes. This session is designed to improve muscular endurance and raise your FTP by working at "Sweet Spot". Based on FTP of 228W.

textevent.message: Activators: 30 seconds easy, 30 seconds at FTP.
Activators complete. Main set is next.
Interval 1 of 2. 15 minutes at 205W. Settle in, this is a sustained effort.
5 minutes down. Focus on your breathing and keep the pedals turning smoothly.
10 minutes done. You're in the rhythm now. Stay strong.
Great work. 5 minutes of recovery. Spin the legs.
Interval 2 of 2. Last big effort. Let's go!
Find that focus again. This is where the fitness is built.
Just 5 minutes to go. You've got this.
Main set complete! Excellent focus. Now a 12-minute endurance block at 150W.
Cool-down. Let your heart rate come down gradually.
